description: The trails near Durrance Lake (Partridge Hills Trails) are smooth single and double track. Is is easy to get lost as there are many unmarked trails and the terrain includes many small hills.
directions: Go north from Victoria on West Saanich Rd. Just past the Big Red Barn Market. Take Wallace Dr to Willis Point Rd to Durrance lake. It is about 25 minutes from downtown.
title: Gowland Prov Park Durrance Lake XC Bike
